text: Hi All, I'm deciding on which route to take for developing some new templates or theme on the CMS. I was watching a video on the local development route and was interested in the dnd_areas, can these 'new' dnd-areas be used in template code when building templates in the 'Design tools' or only in the 'local development' route?
Template code for defaults.. the page editor takes over after that

Thanks <@U38EZFVFE>, ok, so if i went down the 'design tools' route I wouldn't be able to offer the new *dnd-areas* page building functionality to the content editors and If they wanted layout changes they would need to use pre-built modules or the template design tools?
If you are creating themes then you will be using his ml and hubl regardless
Hey everyone, Geoff here founder of <https://www.workforimpact.com/|Work for Impact> we are new to HubSpot though loving it, we look forward to joining this wonderful community
